cases.query: select count(*) from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d for no_cache
cases.notes: Tests page traversal performance only; avoids data copies, serialization, and evaluation.

cases.query: select count(*), sum(A), min(B), max(C) from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d for no_cache
cases.notes: Reducer performance. Percentile is excluded because it prevents parallelization unless time-grouped.

cases.query: select percentile(@Timestamp % 1ms, 90) from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d group by @Level, time(12h) for no_cache
cases.notes: Common reducer/grouping combination used when monitoring performance.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where RequestId is not null and @Timestamp >= now() - 30d for no_cache
cases.notes: Tests sparse deserialization and condition evaluation atop basic page traversal.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where @Exception like 'Sys%' and @Timestamp >= now() - 30d for no_cache
cases.notes: Text search performance. Chooses 'Sys' because in .NET data there should be some hits.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where @Message like 'Fai%' and @Timestamp >= now() - 30d for no_cache
cases.notes: Text search performance; worse on @Message than other properties because fragment pre-filtering is not used.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d group by @Level for no_cache
cases.notes: Grouping performance, strings, small number of groups.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d group by @Timestamp % 1ms limit 100 for no_cache
cases.notes: Grouping performance, numbers, up to 10000 groups.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d group by time(12h) for no_cache
select distinct(substring(@Exception, 0, 20)) from stream where @Exception is not null and @Timestamp >= now() - 30d limit 100
select @Timestamp from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 30d order by @Timestamp % 1ms limit 10
select @Message from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 2d order by @Message limit 10
cases.notes: Adds character collation to limited sort.

cases.query: select @Message from stream where @Timestamp >= now() - 2d order by @Message ci limit 10
cases.notes: Adds case insensitive character collation to limited sort.

cases.query: select count(*) from stream where (A = 1 or B = '2' or C or D <> null or length(E) > 5 or F = {f: 6} or G = '7' or H like '8%' or I > 9 or J % 10 = 0) and @Timestamp >= now() - 30d for no_cache
